name: Crown Of Chaos
description:
With a large army coming towards his village the young farmer Xalfon must wear a cursed item to protect his village, The Crown of Chaos.

See how long you can last against and endless army when you're ability each turn is randomised.
Strike to use your current ability.
Suppress to store TP and take less damage.
Surge to use your current ability multiple times, at the cost of TP.
and Shift to redraw your current ability.

At the end of each combat choose between adding a new ability to your repertoire, or restoring HP. How long can you last?

This is my first game, and was made in about a week, I hope you enjoy and I'd appreciate any feedback.

(Originally made for the GMTK 2020  GameJam with the theme being 'Out of Control')
